duties_responsibilities.duty: Simulate real-world scenarios and emulate TTPs of real adversaries using threat intelligence and the MITRE ATT&CK Framework.
Build and maintain red team infrastructure, automate functions, and research new offensive security tactics.
Develop custom tools and tradecraft to automate tasks and increase team capabilities.
Execute advanced social engineering campaigns, assist cyber defense teams during incident investigations, and communicate findings to client stakeholders.
Train other engineers in adversary simulation tactics, techniques, and procedures, and participate in purple team exercises.
Produce high-quality reports detailing exercise results, vulnerabilities, risks, proposed mitigations, and improvement opportunities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related discipline, or equivalent work experience. Master's preferred.
